description: This file defines a React-like component using Qwik framework that renders a hero section with an image, heading, paragraph, and buttons. It includes interactive confetti animation triggered on button click.

methods.name: loadConfetti
methods.description: Dynamically loads the confetti JavaScript library from CDN and resolves with the confetti function.

methods.name: shoot
methods.description: Triggers the confetti animation with different particle counts and sizes.
